sentences.en: ...the alleged financial misdeeds of his government.
sentences.cn: ...他的政府被指控在财政方面行为不当。

sentences.en: Don't ever think sin is only a minor misdeed or an occasional outburst of wrongdoing.
sentences.cn: 不要认为罪行只是罪恶的一种反射或者是一次偶然地做错事.

sentences.en: He now repents of his past misdeeds.
sentences.cn: 他现在对自己过去犯下的种种恶行感到懊悔。

sentences.en: I am afraid he can not atone for all his misdeed.
sentences.cn: 恐怕他无法抵偿他所有的罪行.

sentences.en: I was to blame in part for this misdeed.
sentences.cn: 对这个错误我要负部分责任.
